Name: Bad Apples
About the game: Bad Apples is a multiplayer survival action game featuring fruits that ripen over time. You can play online against up to 4 players. As the fruits ripen and their gauge rises, their status (speed, attack, defense, etc.) changes. You can speed up the ripening speed of your opponent by shooting gas from you at them. If it is too ripe, it will rot, but the strength of the gas you release will increase. Use items, attacks, and special moves at the right time to defeat the other fruits and survive! (Who's the strongest bad fruit?) ・You can play online with 2 to 4 players at the same time. ・You can play against other users or against your friends in a private environment.
